entry.title: Services
entry.content:
Corporate

  • T2 Corporation tax return

  • Apply for GST, PST, WCB, Payroll and Import & Export number

  • Computerized accounting systems setup

  • GST, PST and WCB report preparation and remittances

  • Preparation of financial statements

  • Payroll preparation and source deduction remittances, T4, T4 summary, ROE


Personal

  • T1 personal income tax return ( E-filing )

  • Foreign properties reporting

  • Accounting for self-employment

  • Non-resident income tax return

  • Previous years income tax return and adjustments

  • Personal and family income tax planning


Accounting training

  • Bookkeeping / Accounting Fundamentals training

  • Accounting software training

  • Simple personal income tax training


Other related services

  • New immigrant GST credit application

  • SIN, MSP, Canada Child Tax Benefit application

  • MSP premium assistance and PharmaCare premium assistance application

  • Children Registered Education Saving Plan ( Government Grant )

  • Registered Retired Saving Plan

  • Financial planning services

entry.title: About us
entry.content:
Our practice provides taxation, accounting, business advisory services. We service a wide range of small and medium size companies in a variety of industries, businesses and professions. With our special focus on taxation, we want to assist our clients to plan their business affairs to minimize their taxes year after year, as well as to devise and implement tax plans that anticipate future changes in their affairs.



Accountant: Linda Sun is a member of the Chartered Professional Accountant Association of Canada and the Chartered Professional Accountant Association of British Columbia



she started her professional career since 1991, both accounting firm and industry working experience give her exceptional strategies on her own public practice, she enjoys working closely with her clients assisting them in all the financial aspect of their business affairs.
